original_text:
Prometheus Titan of Fire
Il fornitore di software svedese Fantasma Games ha deciso di celebrare la figura mitologica di Prometeo, con una nuova slot online intitolata Prometheus Titan of Fire. Con 40 linee di pagamento, un RTP del 95.7% e un massimo di vincita pari a 1.356x la puntata, questo nuovo titolo a tema mitologico è ideale per gli appassionati di giochi in stile hold ‘n win e free spin. Scendi nel misterioso sotterraneo per sfidare il terribile Minotauro dopo aver letto la mia recensione!
Prometheus Titan of Fire: Gameplay e Scommesse
Per prima cosa, imposta la tua scommessa tra 0,20€ fino a 100€ per giro utilizzando un tablet, un dispositivo mobile o desktop. Il gioco si svolge su una griglia a 5 rulli, disposta in un layout 3-4-4-4-3. Con questa configurazione, gli utenti ottengono 40 linee di pagamento fisse su cui realizzare combinazioni vincenti. L’RTP è del 95,7% e la volatilità risulta media.
Simboli della slot senza registrazione Prometheus Titan
Sui rulli compaiono otto simboli di pagamento:
· 4 sono icone gemma di basso valore che valgono 1 volta la puntata per cinque dello stesso tipo;
· 4 sono i simboli Aquila, Minotauro, Medusa e presumibilmente Prometeo, che pagano 2-5 volte la puntata per cinque icone uguali.
I jolly si fermano sui rulli 1, 2, 3 o 4 e possono sostituire qualsiasi normale simbolo di pagamento o ottenere da soli 3 o 4 vincite uguali.
Prometheus Titan of Fire: caratteristiche della slot
Quando si tratta di funzionalità, Prometheus Titan of Fire è un mix di raccolte di monete, respin e giri gratuiti. Analizziamoli insieme di seguito:
· Funzionalità Fire Collect
I simboli Fire Collect sono presenti sui rulli 1 e 5 nel gioco base o bonus. Se un simbolo Fire Collect si ferma contemporaneamente su uno o più icone Moneta sui tre rulli centrali, vengono assegnati i valori dei gettoni. Le monete possono valere da 1 a 30 volte la puntata.
· Double Collect Respin
Se entrambi i simboli Fire Collect si fermano, attivano il Double Collect Respin. I rulli 1 e 5 sono bloccati, mentre vengono assegnati 3 respins che possono colpire solo monete o spazi vuoti. Al termine dei giri gratis, saranno conteggiati tutti i valori dei gettoni visualizzati, due volte.
· Giri Gratuiti
L’ottenimento di 3 simboli bonus nel gioco base attiva il round bonus, in cui vengono assegnati 12 giri gratuiti. Nei FS, ogni posizione sui tre rulli centrali inizia con un livello Hot Spot pari a 1. Qualsiasi
simbolo di moneta atterrato aumenta il valore dell’Hot Spot di +1 alla fine del giro. La meccanica di raccolta procede in base ad una tabella visionabile nel regolamento del gioco.
· Super Free Spins
Tutti i punti caldi attivi dai giri gratuiti vengono trasferiti ai Super Free Spins. Un simbolo di raccolta è bloccato in posizione sui rulli 1 e 5, così come 3 simboli moneta fermi sui tre rulli centrali. A questo punto si attivano 5 respins in cui qualsiasi nuova moneta o simbolo di raccolta si bloccano in posizione. Al termine dei giri, valori dei gettoni vengono raccolti un numero di volte pari al numero di simboli di raccolta bloccata;
· Acquisto Bonus
Infine, ove disponibile, i giocatori possono sborsare 70 volte la scommessa per acquistare i giri gratuiti. In questo modo viene fornito con un RTP del 96,4%.

Domande Frequenti 
Questa slot ha un jackpot progressivo?

No. La slot Prometheus Titan of Fire non ha un jackpot progressivo ma dispone di moltissime funzionalità Free Spin per aumentare le tue vincite.



Quanto posso vincere in questo gioco?

Prometheus Titan of Fire può pagare fino a 1356 volte la puntata. Ciò significa che puoi vincere importi medi di 1356€ (quando giochi con denaro reale) scommettendo solo 1€.



Posso giocare gratuitamente a Prometheus Titan of Fire?

SÌ! Puoi provare la nostra demo di gioco gratuita per divertimento, senza il rischio di perdere soldi, proprio qui su Slotjava. Puoi giocare free o con soldi veri in tutti i casinò ADM/AAMS consigliati che dispongono di slot Fantasma Games.

Prometheus Titan of Fire

Fantasma Games, the Swedish software provider, has decided to celebrate the mythical figure of Prometheus with a new online slot titled Prometheus Titan of Fire. With 40 paylines, an RTP of 95.7%, and a maximum payout of 1,356x your bet, this new mythological-themed title is ideal for fans of hold 'n win and free spin style games. Descend into the mysterious underground to challenge the terrible Minotaur after reading my review!

Prometheus Titan of Fire: Gameplay and Betting

First, set your bet between €0.20 up to €100 per spin using a tablet, mobile device, or desktop. The game takes place on a 5-reel grid, arranged in a 3-4-4-4-3 layout. With this configuration, users get 40 fixed paylines on which to make winning combinations. The RTP is 95.7%, and the volatility is medium.

Prometheus Titan Symbol without Registration:

There are eight paying symbols on the reels:

· 4 are low-value gem icons worth 1 time the bet for five of the same kind;

· 4 are the symbols Eagle, Minotaur, Medusa, and presumably Prometheus, which pay 2-5 times the bet for five identical icons.

The wilds stop on reels 1, 2, 3, or 4 and can replace any normal paying symbol or get their own 3 or 4 equal wins.

Prometheus Titan of Fire: features of the slot machine

When it comes to features, Prometheus Titan of Fire is a mix of coin collections, respins, and free spins. Let's analyze them together below:

· Fire Collect Functionality

Fire Collect symbols are present on reels 1 and 5 in the base or bonus game. If a Fire Collect symbol stops simultaneously on one or more Coin icons on the three central reels, the token values ​​are assigned. Coins can be worth from 1 to 30 times the bet.

· Double Collect Respin

If both Fire Collect symbols stop, they activate the Double Collect Respin. Reels 1 and 5 are locked, while 3 respins are awarded, which can only hit coins or empty spaces. At the end of the free spins, all token values ​​displayed will be counted twice.

· Free Spins

Getting 3 bonus symbols in the base game activates the bonus round, in which 12 free spins are awarded. In the FS, each position on the three central reels starts with a Hot Spot level equal to 1. Any coin symbol landed increases the Hot Spot value by +1 at the end of the spin. The collection mechanic proceeds based on a table visible in the game's regulations.

· Super Free Spins

All hotspots active from free spins are transferred to Super Free Spins. A collection symbol is locked in position on reels 1 and 5, as are 3 coin symbols on the three central reels. At this point, 5 respins are activated in which any new coin or collection symbol locks in position. At the end of the spins, token values ​​are collected a number of times equal to the number of locked collection symbols.

· Bonus Purchase

Finally, where available, players can spend 70 times the bet to purchase free spins. This way, you are provided with an RTP of 96.4%.

Frequently Asked Questions

Does this slot have a progressive jackpot?

No. The Prometheus Titan of Fire slot does not have a progressive jackpot, but it has many Free Spin features to increase your winnings.

How much can I win in this game?

Prometheus Titan of Fire can pay up to 1,356 times the bet. This means that you can win average amounts of € 1,356 (when playing with real money) by betting only €1.

Can I play Prometheus Titan of Fire for free?

Yes! You can try our free play demo for fun, without the risk of losing money, right here on Slotjava. You can play for free or with real money in all recommended ADM / AAMS casinos that have Fantasma Games slots.

response.headline: Game Features to Keep You Entertained!
response.content:
Are you ready to be impressed? Prometheus Titan of Fire is jam-packed with features that will keep you hooked from start to finish. Whether it’s collecting coins, triggering respins, or scoring free spins, this game has everything a player needs to experience big wins and tons of fun!

First, there’s the Fire Collect symbol present on reels 1 and 5 in the base or bonus game, which allows players to collect Coins. These coins can have values ranging from 1 to 30 times the bet. It’s like picking up money on the street, only you don’t have to break your back bending over to get it!

If that doesn’t get your heart racing, the Double Collect Respin feature will surely do the trick. It allows players to lock reels in place and receive three respins, increasing their chances of getting more coins and big payouts. It’s like being a magician but instead of rabbits, you’re making coins appear out of thin air.

But wait, there’s more! The free spins feature is triggered when three bonus symbols are landed, which instantly gives you 12 free spins. Now, that’s what we call generous! But what if we told you it gets even better? That’s right; there are also Super Free Spins, where players can collect even more rewards by collecting collection symbols. We won’t blame you if your head explodes from all the excitement!

Overall, Prometheus Titan of Fire is well-designed, and the game’s features are integrated seamlessly into the gameplay. It’s impossible to get bored when there’s so much going on, and with the potential for huge payouts, this is undoubtedly a game that you don’t want to miss. So what are you waiting for? Grab your torch, ignite your fire, and see where it takes you in Prometheus Titan of Fire!

Descend into the mysterious underground to challenge the terrible Minotaur after reading my review!

Prometheus Titan of Fire: Gameplay and Betting

First, set your bet between €0.20 up to €100 per spin using a tablet, mobile device, or desktop. The game takes place on a 5-reel grid, arranged in a 3-4-4-4-3 layout. With this configuration, users get 40 fixed paylines on which to make winning combinations. The RTP is 95.7%, and the volatility is medium.

Prometheus Titan Symbol without Registration:

There are eight paying symbols on the reels:

· 4 are low-value gem icons worth 1 time the bet for five of the same kind;

· 4 are the symbols Eagle, Minotaur, Medusa, and presumably Prometheus, which pay 2-5 times the bet for five identical icons.

The wilds stop on reels 1, 2, 3, or 4 and can replace any normal paying symbol or get their own 3 or 4 equal wins.

Prometheus Titan of Fire: features of the slot machine

When it comes to features, Prometheus Titan of Fire is a mix of coin collections, respins, and free spins. Let's analyze them together below:

· Fire Collect Functionality

Fire Collect symbols are present on reels 1 and 5 in the base or bonus game. If a Fire Collect symbol stops simultaneously on one or more Coin icons on the three central reels, the token values ​​are assigned. Coins can be worth from 1 to 30 times the bet.

· Double Collect Respin

If both Fire Collect symbols stop, they activate the Double Collect Respin. Reels 1 and 5 are locked, while 3 respins are awarded, which can only hit coins or empty spaces. At the end of the free spins, all token values ​​displayed will be counted twice.

· Free Spins

Getting 3 bonus symbols in the base game activates the bonus round, in which 12 free spins are awarded. In the FS, each position on the three central reels starts with a Hot Spot level equal to 1. Any coin symbol landed increases the Hot Spot value by +1 at the end of the spin. The collection mechanic proceeds based on a table visible in the game's regulations.

· Super Free Spins

All hotspots active from free spins are transferred to Super Free Spins. A collection symbol is locked in position on reels 1 and 5, as are 3 coin symbols on the three central reels. At this point, 5 respins are activated in which any new coin or collection symbol locks in position. At the end of the spins, token values ​​are collected a number of times equal to the number of locked collection symbols.

· Bonus Purchase

Finally, where available, players can spend 70 times the bet to purchase free spins. This way, you are provided with an RTP of 96.4%.

        Review: Prometheus Titan of Fire

Fantasma Games, the Swedish software provider, has decided to celebrate the mythical figure of Prometheus with a new online slot titled Prometheus Titan of Fire. With 40 paylines, an RTP of 95.7%, and a maximum payout of 1,356x your bet, this new mythological-themed title is ideal for fans of hold 'n win and free spin style games. Descend into the mysterious underground to challenge the terrible Minotaur after reading my review!

Prometheus Titan of Fire: Gameplay and Betting

First, set your bet between €0.20 up to €100 per spin using a tablet, mobile device, or desktop. The game takes place on a 5-reel grid, arranged in a 3-4-4-4-3 layout. With this configuration, users get 40 fixed paylines on which to make winning combinations. The RTP is 95.7%, and the volatility is medium.

Prometheus Titan Symbol without Registration:

There are eight paying symbols on the reels:

· 4 are low-value gem icons worth 1 time the bet for five of the same kind;

· 4 are the symbols Eagle, Minotaur, Medusa, and presumably Prometheus, which pay 2-5 times the bet for five identical icons.

The wilds stop on reels 1, 2, 3, or 4 and can replace any normal paying symbol or get their own 3 or 4 equal wins.

Prometheus Titan of Fire: features of the slot machine

When it comes to features, Prometheus Titan of Fire is a mix of coin collections, respins, and free spins. Let's analyze them together below:

· Fire Collect Functionality

Fire Collect symbols are present on reels 1 and 5 in the base or bonus game. If a Fire Collect symbol stops simultaneously on one or more Coin icons on the three central reels, the token values ​​are assigned. Coins can be worth from 1 to 30 times the bet.

· Double Collect Respin

If both Fire Collect symbols stop, they activate the Double Collect Respin. Reels 1 and 5 are locked, while 3 respins are awarded, which can only hit coins or empty spaces. At the end of the free spins, all token values ​​displayed will be counted twice.

· Free Spins

Getting 3 bonus symbols in the base game activates the bonus round, in which 12 free spins are awarded. In the FS, each position on the three central reels starts with a Hot Spot level equal to 1. Any coin symbol landed increases the Hot Spot value by +1 at the end of the spin. The collection mechanic proceeds based on a table visible in the game's regulations.

· Super Free Spins

All hotspots active from free spins are transferred to Super Free Spins. A collection symbol is locked in position on reels 1 and 5, as are 3 coin symbols on the three central reels. At this point, 5 respins are activated in which any new coin or collection symbol locks in position. At the end of the spins, token values ​​are collected a number of times equal to the number of locked collection symbols.

· Bonus Purchase

Finally, where available, players can spend 70 times the bet to purchase free spins. This way, you are provided with an RTP of 96.4%.
